thread.title: BlackBerry Agrees to Buy Good Technology for $425 Million
thread.title_full: BlackBerry Agrees to Buy Good Technology for $425 Million - Bloomberg Business

author: Gerrit De Vynck
title: BlackBerry Agrees to Buy Good Technology for $425 Million
text:
BlackBerry Ltd. agreed to buy Good Technology Corp., one of its competitors in mobile-device management, for $425 million.
Good Technology, based in Sunnyvale, California, builds applications to help employees work securely from their personal phones, BlackBerry said in a statement Friday.
